What's New for OpenServer What's New for UnixWare 7 / Open UNIX 8
List of All OpenServer Packages List of All UnixWare 7 / Open UNIX 8 Packages
List of OpenServer Packages on the latest Skunkware disc List of UnixWare 7 / Open UNIX 8 Packages on the latest Skunkware disc
Join the Skunkware announcements mailing list

The following packages have either been added or updated recently. To install: download, extract the tar archive into an empty directory and use the SCO Software Manager (custom) to install from media images. Note that many of the graphical X clients depend on the Graphics Libraries package which must be installed first.

New/Updated Skunkware for OpenServer
  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/squid-2.4.STABLE4-VOLS.tar
    - Squid is a WWW Cache application developed by the National Laboratory
      for Applied Network Research and members of the Web Caching community.

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/cdrtools-1.11a13-VOLS.tar
    - Record audio/data Compact Discs from a master

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/samba-2.2.2-VOLS.tar
    - A Windows SMB/CIFS fileserver for UNIX

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/tightvnc-1.2.2-VOLS.tar
    - Client/server remote network access to graphical desktops

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/pth-1.4.1-VOLS.tar
    - GNU Portable Threads

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/apache-1.3.23-VOLS.tar
    - Latest release of the Apache web server including version
      2.8.7-1.3.23 of mod_ssl

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/php4-4.1.2-VOLS.tar
    - Latest release of the server-side, cross-platform, HTML embedded
      scripting language PHP. Install the above Apache package first
      and the PHP installation will automatically configure Apache.
      This release of PHP is built as a dynamically loaded Apache 
      module rather than a standalone CGI program.

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/prngd-0.9.23-VOLS.tar
    - Pseudo Random Number Generator Daemon

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/zlib-1.1.4-VOLS.tar
    - New release of the zlib compression library (libz.so.1) which
      addresses a security alert. Note that this package should be used
      in conjunction with the recently available OpenSSH package
      available at:
      ftp://stage.caldera.com/pub/security/openserver/CSSA-2002-SCO.10/
      Note also that OpenSSH requires PRNGD available above.

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/mutt-1.2.5.1-VOLS.tar
    - A small but powerful text based mail user agent 

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/zip-2.3-VOLS.tar
    - A compression and file packaging utility

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/postgresql-7.2-VOLS.tar
    - PostgreSQL is a robust, next-generation, Object-Relational Database
      Management System, derived from the Berkeley Postgres DBMS. While 
      PostgreSQL retains the powerful object-relational data model, rich 
      data types and easy extensibility of Postgres, it replaces the PostQuel 
      query language with an extended subset of SQL.
      (http://www.postgresql.org/)

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/bfr-1.5-VOLS.tar
    - A large-scale command-line general-purpose data buffer.
      (http://www.glines.org:8000/software/buffer.html)

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/osr5/vols/ncftp-3.1.2-VOLS.tar
    - NcFTP Client is a set of application programs implementing 
      the File Transfer Protocol (FTP). It offers many ease-of-use 
      and performance enhancements over the stock ftp client. 
      (http://www.ncftp.com/)

The following packages have either been added or updated recently. To install: download, uncompress with gunzip if necessary, and install with pkgadd.

New/Updated Skunkware for UnixWare 7 / Open UNIX 8
  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/squid-2.4.STABLE4.pkg
    - Squid is a WWW Cache application developed by the National Laboratory
      for Applied Network Research and members of the Web Caching community.

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/prngd-0.9.23.pkg
    - Pseudo-Random Number Generator Daemon repackaged to start up
      prior to SSH.

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/samba-2.2.2.pkg
    - A Windows SMB/CIFS fileserver for UNIX

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/xemacs-21.4.3.pkg
    - A version of Emacs, compatible with and containing many 
      improvements over GNU Emacs. XEmacs is an extensible, customizable, 
      self-documenting, real-time display editor.

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/make-3.79.1.pkg
    - GNU make allows programmers to maintain, update, and regenerate 
      groups of programs

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/libpcap-0.6.2.pkg
    - A portable framework for low-level network monitoring

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/snort-1.8.2.pkg
    - A network intrusion detection system

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/tcpdump-3.7.1.pkg
    - Dump traffic on a network

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/proftpd-1.2.4.pkg
    - Professional FTP Daemon

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/tightvnc-1.2.2.pkg
    - Client/server remote network access to graphical desktops

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/a2ps-4.13b.pkg
    - An any-to-postscript filter (and much more)

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/libxml2-2.4.16.pkg
    - XML parser library

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/libxslt-1.0.9.pkg
    - An XML language to define transformation for XML

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/ntp-4.1.0.pkg
    - The Network Time Protocol distribution

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/pcre-3.9.pkg
    - Perl-compatible regular expression library

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/python-2.2.pkg
    - An interpreted interactive object-oriented programming language

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/qt232-2.3.2.pkg
    - QT C++ Graphical User Interface toolkit

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/rpm-3.0.6.pkg
    - The Redhat Package Manager

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/apache-1.3.23.pkg
    - Latest release of the Apache web server including version
      2.8.7-1.3.23 of mod_ssl

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/php4-4.1.2.pkg
    - Latest release of the server-side, cross-platform, HTML embedded
      scripting language PHP. Install the above Apache package first
      and the PHP installation will automatically configure Apache.
      This release of PHP is built as a dynamically loaded Apache 
      module rather than a standalone CGI program.

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/zlib-1.1.4.pkg
    - New release of the zlib compression library (libz.so.1) which
      addresses a security alert. Note that this package should be used
      in conjunction with the recently available OpenSSH package
      available at:
      ftp://stage.caldera.com/pub/security/openunix/CSSA-2002-SCO.11/
      Note also that OpenSSH requires PRNGD available at:
      ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/prngd-0.9.23.pkg

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/mutt-1.2.5.1.pkg
    - A small but powerful text based mail user agent 

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/zip-2.3.pkg
    - A compression and file packaging utility

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/top-3.5beta9.pkg
    - Top provides updated information about the top cpu processes

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/postgresq-7.2.pkg
    - PostgreSQL is a robust, next-generation, Object-Relational Database
      Management System, derived from the Berkeley Postgres DBMS. While 
      PostgreSQL retains the powerful object-relational data model, rich 
      data types and easy extensibility of Postgres, it replaces the PostQuel 
      query language with an extended subset of SQL.
      (http://www.postgresql.org/)

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/bfr-1.5.pkg
    - A large-scale command-line general-purpose data buffer.
      (http://www.glines.org:8000/software/buffer.html)

  ftp://ftp2.caldera.com/pub/skunkware/uw7/Packages/xscreensa-4.02.pkg
    - XScreenSaver is an extensible screen saver framework, plus locking

Caldera International, The Santa Cruz Operation, Inc. and Caldera Skunkware are not related to, affiliated with or licensed by the famous Lockheed Martin Skunk Works (R), the creator of the F-117 Stealth Fighter, SR-71, U-2, Venturestar(tm), Darkstar(tm), and other pioneering air and spacecraft.
